title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Skills: Strengthening Social Engagement Through Service Learning and Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: When analyzing community issues, learners can collect data and create visualization reports using smartphone apps
Learners can select and utilize appropriate mobile technology tools (communication, collaboration, documentation) for each stage of a service learning project
Learners can design community contribution measurement indicators as project deliverables and produce them as digital portfolios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
